Instruction: 'Wash and trim the woody ends of the asparagus spears.'
In a small saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat.'
Mince garlic cloves and saute in the olive oil for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.'
'Place the asparagus spears on a baking sheet.'
Drizzle with the garlic-infused olive oil, then sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.'
'Toss gently to coat the asparagus evenly.'
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until asparagus is tender and lightly browned.'
